content: Would it make sense to have some definitions in PGame that allow you to get the left and right options as sets? I wanted to formalize stops (so I can begin formalizing temperature as well) for games, and wanted to get the supremum/infimum of the set of left/right moves of a game.
iInf seems correct. But your games are finite in this context, right? So you can use Finset.inf instead, which might be nicer.
